code.name: Url to thumbnail
code.desc: Given a url of a video hosted on ted, youtube or vimeo, finds where the video is hosted and outputs the thumbnail for that video.

code.name: Questions Reader
code.desc: Example of how you can read and parse JSON file in Java. Requires JSON library.

code.name: Salesforce/Airtable subscription form.
code.desc: Example of salesforce newsletter subscription form. Also shows how a single form can be submitted to multiple destinations.
